content:
In LaTeX, create a document that contains a short poem about a talking tree.
The tree stands tall, its branches sway
A voice within, it starts to say
"I've seen the world, from up high
The changing seasons passing by"
The people come, they listen close
As stories of the world it knows
The tree has watched, as time has flown
And in its wisdom, it has grown
So come and sit, beneath its shade
And hear the tales that it has made
For though it may be just a tree
Its voice is full of history
